duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct intake assessments and screening for patients and families.
Co-lead groups for patients and families.
Treat individuals and families with ongoing monitoring of progress.
Provide case-management and assistance in the overall care of patients within the Deane Center.
Contribute to the larger mission of the Deane Center in patients with cognitive and behavioral challenges.
Participate in administrative and clinical duties including crisis management and coordination with social services.
Be a part of the guidance process to trainees as it relates to the social work field.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Social Work or related field (LCSW licensure preferred)
